0.Cons: Low pay no hours some childish managers very stressful at location

1.Summary: "Never work at McDonald's for more than a year"
1.Cons: The staff is terrible, so many problems and drama with the management and crew it was unbearable.

2.Pros: this is a good starter job to make a little money
2.Cons: a lot of cooking and very hard work if you work the grill

3.Pros: great wrok environment nice break times
3.Cons: bad food and bad managherial skills

4.Cons: low pay rate, always understaffed made it more not worth the pay

5.Pros: fast paced working environment on peak hours
5.Cons: it's mcdonalds, what do you expect

6.Pros: I had a decent manager who was very friendly and most of the other employees were easy to get along with.
6.Cons: Scheduling can be difficult and inconvenient for people working part time. Some managers won't help you schedule around classes.

8.Pros: They pay you, but beware quite often they may try and steal an hour or two. Interacting with people could often be entertaining.
8.Cons: Job was dirty, smelly, and often they'd ask you to do more than what should have been required of you. Customers are rude to you, and treat you like dirt.

9.Cons: You smell like burgers all day
